title: Why Is No One Talking About the Missing Journalist? | Guests: Rep. Thomas Massie & David Green | 10/20/22
description:
An award-winning investigative journalist writing a book on President Biden's abysmal Afghanistan withdrawal appears to have vanished after being raided by the FBI back in April. Why are we only now hearing about it? Glenn and Stu go through this story's possibilities and the oddities surrounding its reporting. Rep. Thomas Massie joins to set the record straight on what the CDC recently voted on and how it affects children and the COVID-19 vaccine. How much influence should Hunter Biden have on the upcoming midterms? Hobby Lobby founder and CEO David Green joins to discuss the Left's continued attack on Christianity and faith-based businesses and the godly response to it. Glenn and Stu review the latest polling data that shows early voting numbers are comparable to a presidential election.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
